instructions: Place dinner plate on bottom middle of the table
Place fork on the left side of the dinner plate, with the tines pointing upward
Place salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, with the tines pointing upward
Place the dinner knife on the right side of the dinner plate, with the blade pointing to the plate
Place salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with its blade pointing toward the dinner knife
Place the soup spoon the the right of the salad knife, pointing upward
Place the water glass to the right corner of the dinner plate closer to the dinner knife
Place the wine glass to the right of the water glass, above the salad knife
Place the next wine glass to the right of the first wine glass
Place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon with the coffee spoon pointing toward soup spoon
Place the bread plate at the top left corner of the dinner plate, above the dinner fork
Place the butter knife on the right edge of the bread plate with the knife's blade pointing upward
Place the dessert fork above the dinner plate, with its tines pointing toward the water glass
Place the dessert spoon above the dessert fork, make sure the spoon points towards the bread plate
Place the napkin on the dinner plate, pointing upward
